title: identity
description: Shared logical identity envelope for actors in CommandLayer (humans, apps, or agents).

id.description: Opaque logical identifier for the actor (user ID, system ID, etc.).

wallet.description: Optional EVM wallet address associated with this identity.

ens.description: Optional ENS name associated with this identity.

role.description: Optional role of this actor in the interaction (e.g., user, system, agent).

metadata.description: Optional additional metadata about the actor. Safe to log.
